title: What are the justifications for ethics? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are ten different ways to think about ethics: Grounding it in human dignity.You can speak to the issue of relationships. For instance family members or customers or employers. Ethics definitely has relational aspects. From Love springs much of ethics.It’s the right thing to do. It’s morally excellent. It’s intrinsically good. Often these type justifications are grounded in beauty to some extent.Ethics is grounded in reciprocity and relationship. Fairness and justice is key. Ethics therefore is basic reciprocity. I suppose this in some sense is the Golden Rule.Grounding it in wisdom and/or nobility in its various forms.Its key for all existence. It’s key for community, security, progress, and indeed freedom.Connecting ethics to a larger purpose of human beings here on earth.Connecting it to self interest in the long-run. That is its the wise thing to do.Parable and narrative.Providing historical examples and case studies.
